block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Learn how to fold this easy Origami Cat designed by Steve Biddle. It is the perfect familiar cat companion for your origami witch or wizard. It is also the perfect origami decoration for Halloween. Mini Cats Everywhere!!! Try it out, I hope you like it. Learn it in less than a minute! Enjoy!!! Here at Heap Art, we are trying to help you practice origami on a regular bases. Every week I will select a minimum of 2 origami models and show you how to fold it. If you like origami and paper airplanes -- Please use the following link to subscribe to my channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/heapart?sub_confirmation=1 My Upload Schedule: Tuesday : A new Paper Airplane, part of my 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge Friday : A new Origami Model never seen before on my channel

block_list.title: More Designs from Steve Biddle
block_list.body:
